com.oneops.proxy.ldap

Class LdapClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oneops.proxy.ldap.LdapClient

  • public class LdapClient
extends Object
    Ldap client for authenticating/searching AD accounts.

    ToDo: Remove sun.security.x509.X500Name. This might be an issue in future java versions with JPMS (Jigsaw).

    Author:
    Suresh G
